sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Walt Disney ( DIS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.4%.
Year to date, Walt Disney has lost about 4.1% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 2.2%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 0.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ), trading down 1.2%, and General Electric ( GE ), trading up 0.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
